          <title>
            <string language="en">Oxygen helps burn fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoffhilfen Brandkraftstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carburants de brûlure d'aides de l'oxygène</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that fuels need oxygen from air to burn.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kraftstoffe Sauerstoff

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les carburants ont 
besoin de l'oxygène de l'air pour brûler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os combustíveis 
necessitam o oxigênio do ar se queimar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i combustibili

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα καύσιμα χρειάζονται

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los combustibles
